name: Bro-ify.me
tagline: A google chrome extension to add a little bro in your browsing.
body:
### This is the bro-ify-er.
Bro, this extension was made for 1 purpose only. To inject some 'bro' into your browsing. 

### FAQ
**Why did you do this, bro?**
Bro, I did this for my brogrammers.

**Are you going to add any stuff to it, bro?**
Probably not, bro... How could I make it any better? I mean, c'mon bro.

**Can I alter and redistribute this extension for: `Name your reason, bro` ?**
You can do what ever you want, bro, its a free country. Just be kind to your fellow bro and give me a little credit. Thanks, Bro.

### I have other questions you didn't answer, what now?
Bro, make up what ever answer you want hear.


### Support or Contact
No support, sorry bro. Contact me if you want: @siefkencp
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
